title: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Training Program Based on Scenario-Based Learning for Mathematics Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of mathematical concepts and ability to use online learning tools
context.additional_context: Targeting job seekers and graduate students, this course aims to develop effective self-regulated learning strategies in mathematical problem-solving. Emphasis is placed on strengthening competencies in creating and monitoring personalized learning plans

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply self-regulated learning strategies with over 80% accuracy in real-world math problem-solving scenarios
Learners can use an SRL strategy checklist to develop weekly learning plans and reflect on implementation outcomes
Learners can evaluate self-regulated learning strategies based on peer feedback and propose improvement measures
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
